PersistentScript.name: functions
PersistentScript.script:
auto(1000)
fname = getuseroption('friendname')
mainbp = getuseroption('MainBP') lootbp = getuseroption('LootBP') supplybp = getuseroption('SuppliesBP') goldbp = getuseroption('GoldBP') extrabp = getuseroption('ExtraBP')
maindpbp = getuseroption('maindpbp') stackdp = getuseroption('stackdpbp') nonstackdp = getuseroption('raredpbp') potbp = getuseroption('potdpbp') ringbp = getuseroption('ringdpbp')
ringname = getuseroption('ringname') maxuhp = getuseroption('MaxUHP') maxghp = getuseroption('MaxGHP') manamax = getuseroption('MaxMana') useextrabp = getuseroption('uebp') sharemoney = getuseroption('sharemoney') mananame = getuseroption("ManaName") killzaoguns = getuseroption('kz0f')
sak1 = getuseroption('towershield') sak2 = getuseroption('rots') sak3 = getuseroption('focuscape') sak4 = getuseroption('spellweaversrobe') sak5 = getuseroption('zaoanrobe') sak6 = getuseroption('woi')
function depot() setsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled', 'no') setsetting('SpellHealer/Enabled', 'no') setsetting('ConditionHealer/Enabled', 'no')
bala = $balance
setuseroption('answerforquestion', false) setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') closewindows() wait(2000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,1200) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,1200) resizewindows() wait(500,1200) openitem(lootbp,mainbp,true) wait(500,1200) resizewindows() end
while windowcount("Depot Chest") == 0 do opendepot() wait(500) end
if getuseroption('trfrdpbp') then wait(400) while windowcount(ringbp) == 0 do openitem(ringbp,"Depot Chest",true) wait(400) end wait(800) for i = 1,3 do if itemcount(ringname, mainbp) < 3 then moveitems(ringname, mainbp , ringbp,1) end wait(300) end wait(1000) while windowcount(ringbp) > 0 do closewindows(ringbp) wait(500) end end
if getuseroption('tpfpdpbp') then wait(300) while windowcount(lootbp) == 0 do openitem(lootbp,mainbp,true) wait(400) end while windowcount(potbp) == 0 do openitem(potbp,"Depot Chest",true) wait(400) end wait(600) while itemcount(lootbp,lootbp) >= 1 do moveitems("great health potion", potbp , lootbp ,100) wait(400) moveitems("ultimate health potion", potbp , lootbp ,100) wait(300) openitem(lootbp,lootbp,false) wait(300) end moveitems("great health potion", potbp , lootbp ,100) wait(400) moveitems("ultimate health potion", potbp , lootbp ,100)
wait(300) while windowcount(lootbp) > 0 do closewindows(lootbp) wait(300) end
while windowcount(lootbp) == 0 do openitem(lootbp,mainbp,true) wait(300) end
while windowcount(supplybp) == 0 do openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(400) end if itemcount("great health potion", potbp) >= (maxghp - itemcount("great health potion",supplybp)) then while itemcount("great health potion", supplybp) < maxghp do moveitems("great health potion", supplybp, potbp,(maxghp - itemcount("great health potion",supplybp)) ) wait(300) end else moveitems("great health potion", supplybp, potbp,(maxghp - itemcount("great health potion",supplybp)) ) end
if itemcount("ultimate health potion", potbp) >= (maxuhp - itemcount("ultimate health potion",supplybp)) then while itemcount("ultimate health potion", supplybp) < maxuhp do moveitems("ultimate health potion", supplybp, potbp,(maxuhp - itemcount("ultimate health potion",supplybp)) ) wait(300) end else moveitems("ultimate health potion", supplybp, potbp,(maxuhp - itemcount("ultimate health potion",supplybp)) ) end
wait(1000) while windowcount(potbp) > 0 do closewindows(potbp) wait(500) end while windowcount(supplybp) > 0 do closewindows(supplybp) wait(500) end end
while windowcount(maindpbp) == 0 do openitem(maindpbp, "Depot Chest") wait(300,500) resizewindows(1000,maindpbp) wait(300,500) end
setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'no') waitping()
local CONFIG = { LOOT_BACKPACK = lootbp, MAIN_DP_BACKPACK = maindpbp, STACKABLE_BACKPACK = stackdp, NOT_STACKABLE_BACKPACK = nonstackdp, }
clearlastonto()
while (true) do foreach lootingitem ITEM_ENTRY do if ITEM_ENTRY.id == 3035 then else while (itemcount(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) > 0) do
if (itemproperty(ITEM_ENTRY.id, ITEM_STACKABLE)) then moveitemsonto(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.STACKABLE_BACKPACK, 1, CONFIG.MAIN_DP_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) wait(600, 1200) else moveitemsonto(ITEM_ENTRY.id, CONFIG.NOT_STACKABLE_BACKPACK, $lastonto, CONFIG.MAIN_DP_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) wait(600, 200) end end end end
if (itemcount(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK) > 0) then openitem(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, false) waitcontainer(CONFIG.LOOT_BACKPACK, false) else break end
wait(100) end
closewindows()
wait(700, 900)
if getuseroption("market") then openmarket() sellitemsmarket('tower shield', sak1, 9999, true) waitping() sellitemsmarket('ring of the sky', sak2, 9999, true) waitping() sellitemsmarket('focus cape', sak3, 9999, true) waitping() sellitemsmarket("zaoan Robe", sak4, 9999, true) waitping() sellitemsmarket("Spellweaver's Robe", sak5, 9999, true) waitping() sellitemsmarket("wand of inferno", sak6, 9999, true) waitping() closemarket() end
setsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('SpellHealer/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('ConditionHealer/Enabled', 'yes')
if $stamina < 15*60 then navsay("nstamina") end end
function bpsforbank() minimizewindows('equip') if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("gobank") else closewindows() wait(1000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) minimizewindows('equip') wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end if useextrabp then while windowcount() < 3 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end end end
function stopbot() navsay("stopbot") pausebot(true) end
function startbot() navsay("startbot") pausebot(false) if $wptsection == 'Refill' then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') end end
function doors(openclose,posx,posy,posz,doorsid, uselocation) -- openclose = 'open' lub 'close' -- doorsid = id zamknietych drzwi -- uselocation = czyu uzywac lokacji
if uselocation then
if islocation(2) and (topitem(posx,posy,posz).id) == doorsid then usedoor(posx,posy,posz, openclose) end else if (topitem(posx,posy,posz).id) == doorsid then usedoor(posx,posy,posz, openclose) end end end
function transfermoney() say("hi") wait(1000)
if $balance == 0 then npcsay("balance") wait(1000) end
npcsay("deposit all") wait(500) npcsay("yes") wait(1000) if sharemoney then npcsay("balance") wait(2000) local mtt = positive(($balance - bala) / 2) local mttt = math.ceil(mtt) npcsay("transfer "..mttt.." to "..fname) wait(1000) npcsay("yes") end end
function withdrawmoney()
Mana = math.positive(manamax - itemcount("mana potion")) * 50 GHP = math.positive(maxghp - itemcount("great health potion")) * 190 UHP = math.positive(maxuhp - itemcount("ultimate health potion")) * 310 Total = math.ceil(Mana + GHP + UHP, 10000) + 10000
if islocation(1) then npctalk("hi", "withdraw "..Total, "yes", "balance") else gotolabel("enterbank") end end
function suppshop() if islocation() then
closewindows() wait(1000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,800) minimizewindows('equip') wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end if useextrabp then while windowcount() < 3 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end
sellflasks()
--GHP amount2 = tonumber(maxghp) - itemcount("great health potion") while amount2 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("great health potion", amount2) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("great health potion",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount2 = amount2-100 end
--UHP amount3 = tonumber(maxuhp) - itemcount("ultimate health potion") while amount3 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("ultimate health potion", amount3) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("ultimate health potion",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount3 = amount3-100 end
--MANAS amount1 = tonumber(manamax) - itemcount("mana potion") while amount1 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("mana potion", amount1) waitping(2,3) if getcontainer(supplybp).emptycount > 0 then moveitems("mana potion",supplybp, mainbp) else moveitems("mana potion",extrabp, mainbp) end waitping(2,3) amount1 = amount1-100 end
end
end
function checksupp() if not islocation(5) then gotolabel("ShopDone") else if itemcount("mana potion") + 10 < tonumber(manamax) or itemcount("great health potion") < tonumber(maxghp) or itemcount("ultimate health potion") < tonumber(maxuhp) then gotolabel("enterbank") end end end
function selfonlyiftraped() setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') end
function selfnoonlyiftraped() setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') end
function bothonlyiftraped() navsay("stoitast") setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() end
function locat(range, trueplace) if not islocation(range) then gotolabel(trueplace) end
end
function locatf(range, trueplace, falseplace)
if not islocation(range) then gotolabel(trueplace) else gotolabel(falseplace) end end
function locatwaction(range,trueplace,actiontodo) if not islocation(range) then gotolabel(trueplace) else actiontodo() end end
function bpsforhunt() higherwindows('equip')
closewindows() wait(1000)
while windowcount() < 4 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() openitem(lootbp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() openitem(goldbp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end
if useextrabp then while windowcount() < 5 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end
setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'yes') end
function zaogunkill()
if killzaoguns then selfonlyiftraped() else selfnoonlyiftraped() end end
function dof(...) local args = {...} for _, v in ipairs(args) do v() end end
function sendsetts() if getuseroption('sf1') then navsay("sf1:true") else navsay("sf1:false") end wait(100) if getuseroption('sf2') then navsay("sf2:true") else navsay("sf2:false") end wait(100) if getuseroption('sf3') then navsay("sf3:true") else navsay("sf3:false") end wait(100) if getuseroption('sf4') then navsay("sf4:true") else navsay("sf4:false") end wait(100) if getuseroption('sf5') then navsay("sf5:true") else navsay("sf5:false") end wait(1000) if getuseroption('kz0f') then navsay("kz0f:true") else navsay("kz0f:false") end end
function getuserop(optcheck, actiontodo)
if not getuseroption(optcheck) then actiontodo() end end
function ask(aski) setuseroption(aski, true) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') end
function guopt(optcheck, dest) if not getuseroption(optcheck) then ask(dest) end end
function gucheck(optcheck,posz,truev,falsev) if getuseroption(optcheck) then wait(100) if $posz ~= posz then gotolabel(truev) else gotolabel(falsev) end end end

PersistentScript.name: ANSWERS
PersistentScript.script:
init start function navmessages( m) local fname = getuseroption('friendname')
print(" .."..m.message.."..") if m.message == 'ylgu1' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofirsttower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == "nstamina" then logout() messagebox("character logout because one of chars has too low stamina")
elseif m.message == 'ylgu2' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gosecondtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgu3' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gothirdtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgu4' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofourthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgu5' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofifthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgu6' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gosixthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgft2' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start2","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgft3' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start3","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgft4' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start4","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgft5' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start5","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ylgft6' then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start6","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'okll1'then gotolabel("leave","FirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'okll2'then gotolabel("leave","SecondTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'okll3'then gotolabel("leave","ThirdTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'okll4'then gotolabel("leave","FourthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'okll5'then gotolabel("leave","FifthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'okll6'then gotolabel("leave","SixthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'n1'then gotolabel("leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'yfih1'then gotolabel("enterwalls") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'yfih2'then gotolabel("start","FirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'ygu1'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofirsttower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd1'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownfirsttower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif m.message == 'n2'then gotolabel("leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'ygu2'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gosecondtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd2'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownsecondtower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif m.message == 'yau3' then setuseroption('answerpots3', true) setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'n3'then gotolabel("leave") setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygu3'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gothirdtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd3'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownthirdtower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif m.message == 'yau4' then setuseroption('answerpots4', true) setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'n4'then gotolabel("leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'ygu4'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofourthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd4'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownfourthtower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
---------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif m.message == 'yau5' then setuseroption('answerpots5', true) setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'n5'then gotolabel("leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'ygu5'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofifthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd5'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownfifthtower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
-----------------------------------------------------------
elseif m.message == 'yau6' then setuseroption('answerpots6', true) setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'n6'then gotolabel("leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setuseroption('answerforquestion', true)
elseif m.message == 'ygu6'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("gofifthtower"..$posz) setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
elseif m.message == 'ygd6'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("rundownfifthtower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
-----------------------------------------------------------
elseif m.message == 'ygt1t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start5","WayToFirstTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() elseif m.message == 'ygt2t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start","WayToSecondTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() elseif m.message == 'ygt3t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start","WayToThirdTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() elseif m.message == 'ygt4t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start","WayToFourthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() elseif m.message == 'ygt5t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start","WayToFifthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() elseif m.message == 'ygt6t'then setuseroption('answerforquestion', true) gotolabel("start","WayToSixthTower") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack()
end end
init end

PersistentScript.name: HEALING CHANGER
PersistentScript.script: auto(100) local fname = getuseroption('friendname') if paround(fname) < 1 then setsetting('SpellHealer/Rules/EXURA ICO/ConditionValue', '80 to 80%') setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/GHP/ConditionValue', getuseroption('inedosghp').from..' to '..getuseroption('inedosghp').to..'%') else setsetting('SpellHealer/Rules/EXURA ICO/ConditionValue', getuseroption('iedosghp').from..' to '..getuseroption('iedosghp').to..'%') setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/GHP/ConditionValue', getuseroption('iedosghp').from..' to '..getuseroption('iedosghp').to..'%') end

PersistentScript.name: DISTANCE MONSTERS
PersistentScript.script:
auto(100) if maround(10) >= 2 and maround(1) < 2 and paround() >= 1 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/Stance', 'Reach') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/Stance', 'No Movement')
end
if maround(10) == 1 then wait(100) setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/Stance', 'Reach') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/Stance', 'No Movement')
end
if $hppc < 60 then setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/MP/Enabled', 'no') else setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/MP/Enabled', 'yes') end

PersistentScript.name: EXORI
PersistentScript.script:
init start
local Monsters = {"Lizard High Guard", "Lizard Zaogun", "Draken Spellweaver", "Draken Warmaster"} init end auto(100,200)
local Players = { Consider = getuseroption('consp'), Distance = 2, FloorDifference = 1, SafeList = {}, }
local Spells = { {Name = "exori gran", Amount = 3}, {Name = "exori", Amount = 2}, {Name = "exori min", Amount = 3}, {Name = "exori ico", Hppc = 10}, {Name = "exori hur", Hppc = 10}, {Name = "exori gran ico", Hppc = 10}, {Name = "utito tempo", Amount = getuseroption('utitoc')}, }
local SpecialAreas = { -- {min x, max x, min y, max y, z} }
local UseTargetState = true
-- DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING BELOW THIS LINE
local i, LastFloor, Exhaust = 1, $posz, $timems
while Spells[i] ~= nil do Spells[i].Info = spellinfo(Spells[i].Name)
if Spells[i].Info.words == 0 then table.remove(Spells, i) else Spells[i].Monsters = Spells[i].Monsters or Monsters Spells[i].NeedDirection = table.find({"WaveSmall", "WaveVerySmall", "WaveBig", "BeamSmall", "BeamBig", "Front", "Strike"}, Spells[i].Info.castarea) ~= nil Spells[i].AttackSupport = Spells[i].Info.group:match("Support") ~= nil
table.lower(Spells[i].Monsters) i = i + 1 end end
auto(200, 400)
if $posz ~= LastFloor then LastFloor, Exhaust = $posz, $timems + 2000 return end
if $timems >= Exhaust and ($targeting or not UseTargetState) then for _, Spell in ipairs(Spells) do if cancast(Spell.Info) and not isinsidearea(SpecialAreas) then if Spell.Amount and (not Players.Consider or paroundfloorignore(Players.Distance, Players.FloorDifference, unpack(Players.SafeList)) == 0) then local BestAmount, BestDir = 0, $self.dir
if Spell.NeedDirection then for Dir, Amount in pairs({n = 0, e = 0, s = 0, w = 0}) do Amount = maroundspell(Spell.Name, Dir, unpack(Spell.Monsters))
if Amount > BestAmount or (Amount >= BestAmount and Dir == $self.dir) then BestAmount, BestDir = Amount, Dir end end else BestAmount = not Spell.AttackSupport and maroundspell(Spell.Name, BestDir, unpack(Spell.Monsters)) or maround(1, false, unpack(Spell.Monsters)) end
if BestAmount >= math.max(Spell.Amount, 1) then while $self.dir ~= BestDir do turn(BestDir) waitping() end cast(Spell.Name) waitping() end elseif Spell.Hppc and $attacked.hppc >= math.max(Spell.Hppc, 1) and table.find(Spell.Monsters, $attacked.name:lower()) and cancast(Spell.Info, $attacked) then cast(Spell.Name) waitping() end end end end

PersistentScript.name: BACKPACKS
PersistentScript.script:
auto(5000) --ALL BPS
local mainbp = getuseroption("MainBP") local supplybp = getuseroption("SuppliesBP") local lootbp = getuseroption("LootBP") local goldbp = getuseroption("GoldBP") local maindpbp = getuseroption("maindpbp") local stackdpbp = getuseroption("stackdpbp") local raredpbp =getuseroption("raredpbp")
setlootingdestination("mainbp", mainbp) setlootingdestination("supplybp", supplybp) setlootingdestination("lootbp", lootbp) setlootingdestination("goldbp", goldbp) setlootingdestination("maindpbp", maindpbp) setlootingdestination("stackdpbp", stackdpbp) setlootingdestination("raredpbp", raredpbp) if itemcount("great health potion") >= getuseroption('MaxGHP') then setsetting('Looting/LootList/great health potion/LootingDestination', 'lootbp') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/great health potion/LootingDestination', 'supplybp') end if itemcount("ultimate health potion") >= getuseroption('MaxUHP') then setsetting('Looting/LootList/ultimate health potion/LootingDestination', 'lootbp') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/ultimate health potion/LootingDestination', 'supplybp') end

PersistentScript.name: DROP FLASKS
PersistentScript.script:
init start
local minAmount = 30 local randMinAmount = minAmount
init end
auto(1000, 3000) dontlist()
if flasks() >= randMinAmount and $cap < 700 then if maround() ~= 0 then wait(500, 1000) else pausewalking(10000)
for i = 283, 285 do if itemcount(i) > 0 then moveitems(i, 'ground') waitping() end end
pausewalking(0)
end randMinAmount = math.random(minAmount - 5, minAmount + 5) end

PersistentScript.name: NAVI MESSAGES
PersistentScript.script: auto(30) local cb = getsetting('Cavebot/Enabled') if cb == 'yes' then if not $navigation then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') messagebox("Navigation","Please connect to navigation server and start cavebot again. If you dont know how to connect NAVIGATION ROOM check navi guide file.") end end

PersistentScript.name: SETT CHECKER
PersistentScript.script:
init start function navmessages( m)
--print(m.message) local msg = m.message
if m.message == "stoitast" then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() end
local bal = tonumber((msg:match("waste-:(%d+)"))) ------------ if bal then balanc = bal - getuseroption('friendwaste') setuseroption('friendwaste', bal) increasemoneyspent(balanc) end ------------ if m.message == "ektmuz" then navsay("ekpoz:"..$posz) end
local msg = m.message local ekposz = (msg:match("edpoz-:(%d+)")) if ekposz then if getuseroption('rd') then if tonumber(ekposz) > $posz then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() setuseroption('ansfz', false) end
else
if tonumber(ekposz) < $posz then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_2+/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category a_1/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') stopattack() setuseroption('ansfz', false) end end end
end init end

auto(1000) --print($looting) if getuseroption('lootgold') then setsetting('Looting/LootList/gold coin/Action', 'Loot') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/gold coin/Action', 'Ignore') end
if getuseroption('lootzh') then setsetting('Looting/LootList/zaoan halberd/Action', 'Loot') else setsetting('Looting/LootList/zaoan halberd/Action', 'Ignore') end

local rname = getuseroption('ringname') if $finger.id == 0 then if maround() < 1 then equipitem(rname, 'finger') wait(1000) end end
if getuseroption('pvpes') then
if $pzone then setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'yes') else setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'no') end
else

end
if getuseroption('sf5') then setuseroption('sf1', true) setuseroption('sf2', true) setuseroption('sf3', true) setuseroption('sf4', true) end if getuseroption('sf4') then setuseroption('sf1', true) setuseroption('sf2', true) setuseroption('sf3', true) end
